thread.title: Introducing Aeroplan miles on select grocery products at Costco
thread.title_full: Introducing Aeroplan miles on select grocery products at Costco

author: Steven Zussino
title: Introducing Aeroplan miles on select grocery products at Costco
text:
Point and Mile Bonuses / Introducing Aeroplan miles on select grocery products at Costco Introducing Aeroplan miles on select grocery products at Costco July 23, 2015 E-mail 
For the first time ever, earn Aeroplan Miles on select Kirkland Signature grocery products at Costco warehouses. 
Simply visit a Costco warehouse between July 22 and August 18, 2015 and spend a minimum of $75 on select Kirkland Signature grocery products to earn 500 miles and get even closer to your next reward! 
Kirkland Signature products deliver unparalleled quality and value in a variety of categories. 
Find out more about all eligible Kirkland categories by clicking here and start earning miles with your grocery cart.
